Waterproofing Excellence for 26 Years Trust the Experts!
Who We Are

Experience & Expertise in Waterproofing

With 26 years of expertise, Chowhan and Sons brings 50 years of collective experience to waterproofing projects across Mumbai. We prioritize quality and customer satisfaction, offering a 10-year guarantee backed by our spotless record of zero complaints.

Our comprehensive services cover terrace, bathroom, kitchen, and basement waterproofing, utilizing advanced methods for lasting protection.

At Chowhan and Sons, we're committed to delivering exceptional results that exceed our clients' expectations, cementing our position as industry leaders in waterproofing solutions.

Why Choose Us?

  • Decades of Expertise:

    Over 26 years in the industry with a team featuring 50+ years of combined experience.

  • Top-Quality Craftsmanship:

    We deliver superior quality using the best materials and techniques.

  • Customer-First Approach:

    Your satisfaction is our priority; we tailor solutions to meet your needs.

  • Wide Range of Services:

    Comprehensive waterproofing solutions for terraces, tanks, bathrooms, basements, and more.

  • Proven Success Record:

    Numerous successful projects across Mumbai for reputed clients.

  • Guaranteed Satisfaction:

    Ten-year guarantee on our work, ensuring lasting protection and reliability.
